CustomField.formula: IF( Record_Type_Name__c = "Post Billpay Contract", IF(AND( APT_Ratecards_Created__c, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Terminated"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_CreateContractValidation?id="&Id & "&count=0",IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create_Green", "Create Contract Documents (One Click)"),"_self"),NULL), IF(AND(NOT(APT_Is_Create_Contract_Batch_Job_Running__c),APT_Ratecards_Created__c,NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Terminated"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_CreateContractValidation?id="&Id & "&count=0",IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create_Green", "Create Contract Documents (One Click)"),"_self"),NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Create Contracts
